TopicTitle: Parts of craft move locations after reloading a save

Articles.Content: I made a small lander with a parachute on the top. I reloaded to a quick save and the parachute was no longer on the top, it was inside the reaction control section which was directly below it. It also appears this may have causes imaginary forces which kept changing the AP and PE.
This isn't just happening with save/loads - the Wheesley engine on this plane keeps migrating upwards on a long endurance flight - no saveloading or warps involved.
